version_description:
Faster translations:
We've been working hard to make your translations are even faster!

Swipe to delete:
Swipe to the left on individual phrases to delete them without clearing your entire conversation.

Tap to edit:
Now you can edit 'What you said', or your translations. Your edits will improve the quality of our service in the future!

Toggle to type:
If you would like to primarily type text into the app, open the language list at the bottom of the conversation view, then tap the toggle to always type.

Improved localizations:
We've improved localizations throughout the app. Thank you for all of your feedback!

**********************

New look:
We gave SayHi a makeover with a simple, modern look.

Hold to type:
Hold the mic button to quickly bring up a keyboard.

New navigation:
Tap the menu button to access settings and more.

Accessible:
Voiceover is once again fully supported, as well as Dynamic Type, and improved navigation for accessiblity.

The latest update to the SayHi Translate app includes bug fixes, is ready for iPhone X, and has improved Bluetooth support.

We love hearing from customers and are always working to improve SayHi Translate. Feel free to send feedback to support@sayhitranslate.com!
